SUBJECT: TNG Portal Patronage Activation Notification
EMAIL_TEMPLATE:
Dear Sir/Madam,

It's my pleasure and honor to welcome you to TNG. Your patronage has been activated. Hope you have a great experience with our patronage benefit and enjoy the journey. Please answer the security question in login page to complete the account registration.
